text: Nurse ( N2 ) indicated that : " The most painful and traumatizing thing in the TB wards is that patients die in large numbers and it is so stressing to see people dying just before you every day . We really need clinical psychologists to come and render counselling , but all they do is to schedule an appointment with us and never come to talk to us . We do not get even debriefing sessions . As a result , we feel that we are losing it , at times we just can ' t cope . "
